name: INBOX (H.Kleous)
description:
Welcome to the cloud. You're here to deliver emails? Well, it's a wireless world out there. Not much power, and a lotta viruses that wanna corrupt your package. Deliver it safe!

//NOTE Crashes might occur when generating levels - please be patient!
------------------------------------------------
A project made for the 7 Day Roguelike Jam!
------------------------------------------------
